definition: cat burglar/burglar who gains entrance by scaling walls/intruding enemy airman/air marauder
to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience
insect that damages cereal crop seedlings/(lit. and fig.) vermin/a person harmful to the country and the people
pirate ship/fig. venture of dubious merit/criminal gang/reactionary faction
lit. a thief crying "Stop the thief!" (idiom)/fig. to accuse sb of a theft and try to sneak away oneself/to cover up one's misdeeds by shifting the blame onto others
lit. a thief crying "Stop the thief!" (idiom)/fig. to accuse sb of a theft and try to sneak away oneself/to cover up one's misdeeds by shifting the blame onto others
horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits

sentences.chinese: 他们成功地抓到了那个贼。

sentences.english: I saw a burglar , with a dirk in his hand, getting into the room where she was sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 我看见一个手握匕首的贼跑进了她睡觉的地方。

sentences.english: The thief slipped out of the room without anybody noticing.
sentences.chinese: 这个贼神不知鬼不觉地从房间里溜了出来。
也别往忘了读读《贼王》这本书。

sentences.english: A bite from a thief sinks to the bone.
While serving as a supply tug operator on Fondor, Shire also was a thief.
sentences.chinese: 希雷既是方多的补给拖船操作员，也是一个偷船贼。

sentences.english: The two thieves fumbled the door open.
sentences.chinese: 那两个贼笨拙地把门打开。

sentences.english: Not being seen by anyone, the thief escaped.
sentences.chinese: 那个贼趁无人看见时逃跑了。

sentences.english: Years Ah soon as fell to the ground, Chung Boy agony Nazei.
sentences.chinese: 万年哎呀一声倒在地上，众童子急呼拿贼。

sentences.english: They looped a rope around the thief.
sentences.chinese: 他们用绳子把那个贼捆了起来。

sentences.english: The dog will smell out a thief.
sentences.chinese: 狗会靠其嗅觉而找到贼。

sentences.english: Police are now on the lookout for these boat thieves.
sentences.chinese: 这群盗船贼现在关押在警察局。

sentences.english: Jaegers are swift black birds with long forked tails.
sentences.chinese: 贼鸥是飞行速度很快的黑色鸟类，尾部长而分叉。

sentences.english: The thief despoiled the old man of his belongings.
sentences.chinese: 贼夺走了那老人的财物。

sentences.english: The beautiful girl with a knife is a thief.
sentences.chinese: 那个拿着刀的漂亮的小女孩是个贼。

sentences.english: The succeeded in catching the thief.
sentences.chinese: 他们成功地抓到了那个贼。

definition: insect that damages cereal crop seedlings/(lit. and fig.) vermin/a person harmful to the country and the people
barbarian/slave servant/(old) contemptuous term for people from southern China (used by northern Chinese people)
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together
